transcript:
Agent: Hello, thank you for answering. My name is John, and I'm calling from GreenTech Solutions. How are you today?
Customer: I'm doing well, thanks. What's this about?
Agent: We specialize in energy-efficient lighting solutions for commercial properties. I came across your company and thought our product could be a good fit.
Customer: That sounds interesting. We've been looking to reduce our energy costs.
Agent: Exactly. Our LED lighting system can help you save up to 70% on your energy bills. It's also environmentally friendly and has a longer lifespan.
Customer: That's impressive. What kind of maintenance does it require?
Agent: Very minimal. Our lights are designed to last up to 50,000 hours, and we offer a 5-year warranty.
Customer: Okay, that sounds good. What's the cost of implementation?
Agent: We offer a free consultation to assess your property and provide a customized quote. But on average, our clients see a return on investment within 2-3 years.
Customer: That's reasonable. Can you send me some more information?
Agent: Absolutely. I'll email you a brochure and case studies from similar companies. Would you like to schedule a consultation?
Customer: Yes, that would be great. What's your availability like?
Agent: How about next Wednesday or Thursday?
Customer: Wednesday works for me. What time?
Agent: How about 10 am?
Customer: That's perfect. I'll make sure to have our facilities manager available.
Agent: Great, I'll send you a confirmation email. Thank you for your time, and I look forward to meeting you next Wednesday.
Customer: You're welcome. Talk to you then.
Agent: Have a great day!
